articles.title: 'I watched mum and dad do heroin every day': Teenager describes growing up with drug addict parents
articles.description: 'Social workers saw it from the outside in not the inside out. I felt like saying, you don't understand [...] I'm still going home to my mum who's doing drugs and feeling suicidal'

articles.author: Hayden Smith, Hayden Smith
articles.title: Revenge porn sentencing guidelines issued to courts for first time
articles.description: Offenders who repeatedly re-post explicit material after it is been taken offline to face toughest punishments
